attributes.action: provide complete funding for the proposed New Mersey Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current plans for a new Mersey crossing mean that only part of the cost will be met by central Government, meaning that both the new bridge and the existing one will be tolled. This is unfair to people living the area and will send more traffic through surrounding roads in order to avoid the tolls.
